metadata.title: CVE-2017-2673 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An authorization-check flaw was discovered in federation configurations ofthe OpenStack Identity service (keystone). An authenticated federated usercould request permissions to a project and unintentionally be granted allrelated roles including administrative roles.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

keystone - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1
python-keystone - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: keystone package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1').
